page.title: 14THE WEARDALE SHOW 2
page.content: The Fair stays in St.Johns Chapel market place from Friday to Monday.The dodgem cars and waltzer are very eye catching to the locals . There is "Hook a Duck" and a miniature train for the young ones and also stalls with fruit machines, space invaders and target games like air guns and darts. "Funday Monday" is a carnival for the children. Last year there was a competition between the Scouts, cubs, guides, and youth clubs to see who could make the best float. The cubs made a farming scene and won twenty five pound. A Scottish band marched down Hood Street in front of the floats and paraded around the field. In the field there was a lot of fun and games for the children to play and for the older ones there was a tug of war competition.
